body: Lags in Always on display'
column6: Review after using this watch for 2+ months.  The watch gets stuck at least once a day and have to restart it every time. The always on display has lags and doesn't display accurate time. title: 'Display'
body: 'Display and build'

title: 'Lot of missing features for a 4999 worth Watch'
body: Pros - -Good build quality. - Awesome display with superior touch. -The chain adjustment tool. -Great battery backup (Lasted 7 days with Notifications ON, Incoming Call Alerts ON, Calling OFF, AOD OFF). -Almost accurate Heart beat and SpO2 readings. -Sleep monitoring feature. -Accurate step counting. -Workout detection. - Music can be controlled on the phone. -Water intake reminder.  Cons- - For a 5000 INR watch, you can upload only one watch face. The 3 default watchfaces look boring and cheap but can't be Uninstaller. - For a metal body and chain watch, there are no suitable analogue watch faces. I found only one suitable face which can be see in the pic. - Alarm on phone don't ring on watch despite of allowing notification. You have to set the Alarm on watch itself. - No Alarm sound, only vibration. - Doesn't ring on incoming calls, only vibrates. - The vibration is weak, you will barely notice. - No Warranty Registration confirmation received yet on the registered email. Registration starus can't be tracked.  In nutshell, the product lacks many features with it's competitor which is 500 rupees cheaper. I have 4 different Noise watches in my family and this is the costliest I bought. Can't say, it's Worth the Money. Can never compare with my Samsung Gear Frontier S3 (06 yrs old). But this one somewhat serves the purpose.  Thanks

title: It's an Hello to Other Swatches by Halo

title: 'Display failure'
body: Bought 2 nos. Of noise halo. Second one returned the same day because of display issue. First one display turned to green colour after 2 month. The same has been given to service center there is no response from service center after 18 days... still waiting.... poor display and very poor service... as per service center guy we may get a refurbished one as replacement... we don't know how much old it is... did we spent money for an old one??? Totally disappointed
